alert.note: Alert for Howard; Little River; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:19AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Little River, Sevier, Howard, McCurtain, northern Franklin, western Bowie, northern Morris, Titus and Red River Counties through 215 AM CST... At 119 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Octavia to 6 miles northeast of Cooper Lake State Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, De Queen, New Boston, Clarksville, Dierks, Horatio, Foreman, Boxelder, Hagansport, Umpire, Idabel, Broken Bow, Mount Vernon, De Kalb, Naples, Bogata, Omaha, Lockesburg, Winthrop and Gillham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
